Articles.Content:
i have made a group for people who want to collectively hunt and share weird sightings and secrets in kerbal space. famous examples are the Mun arch and the other launch site. but did you know their is a crashed alien ship in the frozen tundra? the bureau will work to find and explore galactic anomaly's.

post pics and discuss you're KSP adventures:

https://www.facebook.com/groups/400992046679257/

i will soon get a proper website running but please still join.
every anomaly in the system of Kerbin has already been found and extensively mapped, suffice to say that there are many threads listing all of said anomalys
North and South pole of the mun. Not an easter egg but an interesting sight to behold
